page.shortlink: grid component client side canrowexpand event
page.description: Fires when the user tries to expand a closed row expander. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: isDirty
property.description: Indicates whether or not any edits have been made to the Detail View. If isDirty is true, the current record has been edited.

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
